column1: The Purple Pig////The Purple Pig was probably one of the most memorable meals I've had in a while. My boyfriend I were in Chicago for vacation and I really wanted to try this place because of the reviews on yelp. Needless to say I was very happy that our plans worked out. We ordered the crispy pigs ears
column3: and the blade steak. Our waiter was very great and informative that our plates did not have a course order. The plates would come out whichever was ready first.
